EnemyInfo.Name: Spike Block
EnemyInfo.Description: Imitates the behavior and appearence of spike blocks from Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past, but with more variations.

Property.Name: X Speed
Property.Description: Speed of X movement in .5px/frame (can be negative)

Property.Name: Y Speed
Property.Description: Speed of Y movement in .5px/frame (can be negative)

Property.Name: Delay
Property.Description: Delay when spike hits a wall before moving away again (pixels)

Property.Name: Distance
Property.Description: Distance spike can be moved by shooting (pixels)
